name: Shooter1078
description:
A first person shooter with different guns and ammo. This game is in development, and development is active.

Boost your jump height with recoil

Controls: WASD to move, Hold Ctrl to sprint, Space to jump, Left click to shoot, R to reload, Scroll Up and Down to switch guns, Shift + Scroll Up and Down to switch ammo, Q to drop guns, Shift + Q to drop ammo, Esc to toggle pause.

Point your gun down and shoot to boost your jump.

Join the game's discord server for development updates: https://discord.gg/TwSRzZ5BD3
